messages.subject: help with relatives
messages.msgSnippet: If you have spoken to her and she continues that level of disrespect towards you I WOULD cut off the relationship.  She is going behind your back and trying
messages.messageBody:
If you have spoken to her and she continues that level of disrespect towards you I WOULD cut off the relationship.  She is going behind your back and trying to brainwash your kids into her beliefs.  You do not need to stand for that!!  Just my thoughts

Mary mama to Dylan (11), Colin (6 1/2) and Theo Benjamin (2 1/2)
"Be who you want your children to be."    Unknown   "Each morning we are born again.  What we do today is what matters most."    Buddha

"Men will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest."
    Denis Diderot






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
